item.title: Dragon Pox Panic Grips Diagon Alley! Healers Scramble for Bezoars as New Strain Emerges!
item.description:
Diagon Alley is in a state of controlled chaos this morning after reports of a highly contagious, and frankly rather embarrassing, new strain of Dragon Pox have surfaced. Initial cases were identified amongst goblin-run banking employees at Gringotts, leading some to speculate on the involvement of dark magic, or perhaps just exceptionally unsanitary gold-counting practices.

The Ministry of Magic’s Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes, along with a hastily assembled team of Healers from St. Mungo’s, are working tirelessly to contain the outbreak. Head Healer Augusta Longbottom (n√©e Bell) issued a statement earlier this morning urging calm, while simultaneously hoarding the entire St. Mungo’s bezoar supply. “There is no need for panic,” she declared, her eyes darting suspiciously around the press conference. “Simply avoid close contact with anyone exhibiting symptoms. And for Merlin’s sake, wash your hands after handling galleons!”
